lead_paragraph: The government’s stake will reportedly be trimmed to less than 50 percent in a $10.6 billion initial public offering.
snippet: The government’s stake will reportedly be trimmed to less than 50 percent in a $10.6 billion initial public offering.

headline.main: G.M. Said to Plan Cut in U.S. Stake by a Third
headline.seo: G.M. Said to Plan to Cut U.S. Stake to Less Than Half
headline.print_headline: G.M. Said To Plan Cut In U.S. Stake By a Third

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED and BILL VLASIC
